main.name: Amar Patil
main.description: I'm Technical Lead with over 12+ years of hands-on experience in software development, specializing in architecting and delivering cutting-edge solutions across diverse technologies. I have a strong foundation in a wide array of programming languages and technologies
main.bio: As a seasoned Technical Lead, I specialize in designing and implementing microservices architectures on platforms such as GCP, Cloud Foundry, and Azure. My expertise spans software architecture, including Microservices, N-Tier, SOA, and Onion/Clean design. I have hands-on experience in developing CI/CD pipelines using Docker, Jenkins, and GCP, as well as building APIs with Node.js and Python. With a proven ability to lead teams and manage projects, I also bring full-stack development skills with Bootstrap, Material UI, and basic Python knowledge for Data Science and AI applications.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Technical Lead
work.description: Architecture and Design • Code Review • Provide technical guidance and solutions to the team • Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies • Experiment with new technologies/libraries/tools and integrate them into the project if beneficial • Documentation • Team Management • Project Management • Vision and Strategy • Communicate effectively with stakeholders, including clients, management, and other teams • Identify areas for improvement in the development process and implement changes to enhance efficiency and productivity • Promote best practices and standardization within the team • Coding and Development

work.title: Consultant
work.description: Wokred for Associa, it is Biggest US Based Company specialized in community Management Business. It Uses Various Products for its internal and external customers for dealing with Community Management Business. This Products are built to support scattered Data across all its branches. Process of centralization of this data leveraging the tools it develops is key strategy for IT Department.

work.title: Sr. Solution Developer
work.description: I have worked on multiple projects utilizing various Microsoft technologies and had the privilege of collaborating with prestigious clients, including Microsoft, Hyderabad.
